home.title: Make a change in our society with Make.org -
home.description: Finding solutions is easier when working together. Make.org helps you share ideas with forward-thinking people like you. Discover a democratic place where you can discuss, vote and submit your solutions on the big issues you care about.

followus.title: Learn more about us

methodology.title: Methodology
methodology.description: Our methodology is based on citizens’ solutions collected and reviewed by our Moderation team. They are first submitted for validation with regard to their compliance with the Make.org guidelines, then classified according to a thematic tagging. Algorithms developed by Make.org teams then guarantee each validated solution an equal level of exposure, and organize a competition between them. Through this constant rotation, Make.org identifies the solutions that have the greatest consensus among citizens before analyzing them and grouping them into big ideas.

top_ideas.title: Top emerging ideas, grouped into {{count}} themes
top_ideas.introduction: , The best citizen solutions are grouped into big ideas that structure the consultation. To classify these ideas, the Make.org algorithm takes into account the votes 'Agree' and 'Disagree' as well as the mentions 'Genius', 'Obvious', 'Irrelevant !' and 'Nonsense'.
top_ideas.title_plural: Top ideas is merged in {{count}} topics

support.text: Once the action plan is launched, you can follow here the progress and achievements, support or get involved at any time.

plan.title: Our civic action plan
plan.text: Here, you will soon find the action plan built from the consultation.
plan.list-bait: What is an action on Make.org ?
plan.list-intro: For us, an action must be :
plan.list-second-item: - collective, available and accessible to all,
plan.list-third-item: - mission-driven, with a concrete and measurable impact.

partners.title: Our actions' partners
partners.text: At Make.org, we believe in bringing all civic stakeholders together (citizens, institutions, companies, associations) to move society forward.

form.title: How would you answer this citizen idea?
form.label: Write here...
form.disclaimer: Important: the only way to edit your opinion is to contact the Make.org team. Ready to publish ? Just click on "Confirm and publish".

preview.disagree_nonPriority: I disagree, this solution is not a priority.
preview.other: This solution already exists or needs to be specified .

disclaimer.title: Information
disclaimer.subtitle_first: How to give your opinion on a citizen idea?
disclaimer.description_first: You can vote for any idea with ("Agree", "Disagree" or "Neutral") along with a term to specify your thoughts. This will generate three new fields, in which you can detail your three key measures and/or explain your opinion.
disclaimer.description_second: If you want to edit your measures after clicking "Publish", send us an email at {{mailto}}
disclaimer.subtitle_second: How can I modify my answers ?

hero.title: Together, we can change society for the better
hero.description: Give your opinion on social issues that matter to you by voting on our consultations. Together - citizens, associations, companies - let's set our priorities to make a change through concrete actions!

partnership.title: Collaborate with Make.org
partnership.subtitle: Become partner
partnership.description:
In all our projects, we involve companies, associations and institutions to accelerate collaboration.
We also permit these organisations to create their own consultation.

international.subtitle: National consultations
international.title: Make.org is also available in France for national topics

no_cookies.title: Looks like your cookies are deactivated.
no_cookies.first_paragraph: We cannot let you access the site because we use cookies to ensure the quality of our service.
no_cookies.second_paragraph: In order to optimize your navigation on Make.org, we invite you to allow cookies on this browser or to use another one. To allow cookies on your browser, go to the menu and then to the settings.
no_cookies.information: Click on this link to learn more about how to manage your cookies:
no_cookies.thanks: Thank you for your understanding and see you soon!
no_cookies.footer: Make.org is a civic platform that foster social progress by leveraging citizens' ideas. To find out more about our mission, discover notre actualité.

contact.paragraph: Have an suggestion or want to report a bug? Feel free to send us an email:
